mapper.select: SELECT a._cctv_no AS stid , a._cctv_name AS stname , a._user AS account , a._password AS password , a._path AS "SavePath" , a.need_login , 'http://' || a._cctv_ip || a.url_suffix AS "URL" FROM vr.cctv_view a WHERE url_suffix IS NOT NULL ORDER BY a._cctv_no

SELECT focus_list.project_id AS _id , focus_list.project_name , focus_list.web_url , group_list.group_name , status_list.status_name , focus_list.has_url , array_agg(user_list.user_name) AS report_users , array_agg(user_list.mail) AS report_mails FROM poker_server.focus_list LEFT JOIN poker_server.group_list ON group_list.group_id = focus_list.group_id LEFT JOIN poker_server.status_list ON status_list.status_id = focus_list.status_id LEFT JOIN poker_server.group_user_map ON group_user_map.group_id = focus_list.group_id LEFT JOIN poker_server.user_list ON user_list.user_id = group_user_map.user_id GROUP BY focus_list.project_id, focus_list.project_name, focus_list.web_url, group_list.group_name, status_list.status_name, focus_list.has_url, focus_list.last_report_time;
